function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Weakening of multilateral institutions, including the who, by influential developed countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak public health systems unable to manage population-wide approaches","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on imports for vital equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of prioritization of public health and wellbeing in economic systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weaknesses and disparities in healthcare systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promotion of private sector models for healthcare in low-and middle-income countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in public social expenditures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising inequality and falling labor shares of income","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privatization of essential natural monopolies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in global inequality due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of vulnerabilities caused by neoliberalism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal impact of covid-19 on different social classes, genders, and age groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food insecurity and famine due to lockdowns and other crises","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restriction of movement for essential medical personnel and supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technologies for epidemic monitoring and control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High-speed network reliance for tracking strategic locations and infected patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Industry 4.0 and medicine 4.0 adoption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Governments failing to prepare for the magnitude of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented demand for critical resources","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for innovative and emerging technologies to combat the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of sars cov-2 infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Surge demands for critical care facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to provide protective gear and medical supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial strain preventing industries from investing in iot","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot for operational continuity during pandemics or emergencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overworked hospital staff and overburdened facilities due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote collaboration and control in industrial iot may lead to greater spread of contagious diseases if not managed effectively.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of digital maintenance and automation in response to pandemics may result in operational disruptions and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness in identifying and mitigating potential equipment failures through digital twin technology may lead to increased risk of disease transmission and productivity losses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in travel patterns and behaviors due to covid-19 may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases in transportation networks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of seamless integration of data from different sources may result in inaccurate or unreliable information being shared with travelers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficiency and delays in logistics could lead to hoarding of supplies, social contact, and increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases during supply chain operations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data integration and data security could lead to compromised access control, potentially risking sensitive information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on online services may lead to a reduced physical presence in brick-and-mortar stores, potentially impacting public health and safety.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration and analysis of customer behavior data may limit the effectiveness of ai, iot, and big data solutions in the retail and entertainment industry.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective indoor navigation leading to increased contact with other people","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning due to lack of understanding of indoor mobility data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient integration of data leading to ineffective deployment of context-aware devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in energy consumption from commercial buildings to homes due to covid-19 lifestyle wearables","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on expensive research-grade wearable devices","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obstacles in smart home iot adoption due to cost and technical skills requirement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable technology not optimized for different groups with different lifestyles and deployment on iot devices, affecting the quality of healthcare ai algorithms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of energy-efficient wearable technology leading to rapid battery drainage and reduced usability.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decentralized data pools at personal devices may lead to privacy concerns and unauthorized data
